Script Name: LSF-GLIF
Use condition: Glyph filter Unlocked.
Glyph filter setting: Specified Effects (Mode 4). Enter No. of effects and ALL MUST-HAVE (or no specified) effects.

DON'T ENABLE the recycle button!!!

NOTE: Modify filter score>=xx & pending Glyph level>=xx according to your progress. Related settings in glyph filter also need to be modified. See "Advanced Glyph Mechanics" in "How to Play". You can stick to LSF-UFGV for glyph farming.



Script Name: LSF-4FX

Use condition: Glyph level>=3000 ~ Effarig Level 10 in Ra or glyph level>=10000
Glyph filter setting: Effect Score (Mode 5)
5 Basic: All effect 10. Threshold=rarity%+40
Effarig: Game Speed Pow 10, others 9. Threshold=rarity%+38
Numbers in Line 179, 184, 187 may subject to change as you progress thru the game

DON'T ENABLE the recycle button!!!
